description: metal bank in the shape of a gas fireplace with green brick surround and brown mantel and enclosure; gold decor and detail; label on back from John Wright & Co.; key included
inscription:
Inscriptions

under fireplace, in gold: [WRIGHTS / THERMO X GAS FIRE]; on back, on bottom, in gold: [REGISTERED DESIGN / \"THE AERO\'\"]; on back: [MANUFACTURED BY / JOHN WRIGHT & CO / ASTON, BIRMINGHAM (..., enclosed in a square)]
title: "Wright's Thermo X Gas Fire" still bank
